Search: id:a057450

%I A057450
%S A057450 4,7,17,59,277,1787,15299,167449,2269733,37139213,718064159,
%T A057450 16123689073,414507281407,12055296811267
%N A057450 Prime recurrence: a(n+1) = a(n)-th prime, with a(1) = 4.
%C A057450 _Lubomir Alexandrov_ informs me that he studied this sequence in his 1965 notebook. - _N. J. A. Sloane_, May 23 2008.
%H A057450 Lubomir Alexandrov, <a href="http://www1.jinr.ru/Preprints/2002/055(E5-2002-55).pdf">Prime Number Sequences And Matrices Generated By Counting Arithmetic Functions</a>, Communications of the Joint Institute of Nuclear Research, E5-2002-55, Dubna, 2002.
%t A057450 NestList[ Prime, 4, 13 ]
%Y A057450 Cf. A007097.
%K A057450 nonn,hard,more
%O A057450 1,1
%A A057450 _Robert G. Wilson v_, Sep 26 2000
